_header: The son shall the father slay
_description: An English prophecy — probably about 300 lines in 9-line stanzas (ababbcbbc)

BLCottVitFXIII.First Lines:
The sone shalbe…A wonne… tweynOn þe grounde
                    aganes þe fadre to…Hym to t…y and also to
                    teyne…
BLCottVitFXIII.Last Lines:
…ndon with bale þen shall he be……all all rew
                    þa……be…
BLCottVitFXIII.Note:
Pages damaged by fire. Text on folios 80 and 81 is almost completely
                    destroyed, so last lines are taken from folio 79v.
